resources.string: Tilt and hold the joystick to observe movement.
Change direction. Can you see the Euglena respond?
Now try to get a Euglena in the circle!
Notice the circle tracks the Euglena, and the zoomed view above.
Now let\'s add a Soccer ball! The ball is oriented in the direction of movement.
If carried out of bounds, the ball resets!
Tap the screen or press the pass button to pass the ball in the direction of motion.
Passed balls will bounce off walls and not go out of bounds! Pass the ball near walls to remain in play!
Press the bounce button to randomly bounce the ball! Use this to reposition the ball.
Now let\'s play soccer! Notice the countdown.
You can carry or pass the ball into the goal.
The score changed! You get a point for passing the ball in, and two points for carrying it in.
Take turns playing! Each player gets 30 seconds or until out of bounds. Then pass the joystick.
